FacilityName: Piedmont LLC DBA Voyant Beauty - Warehouse

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE POLICIES: 
Piedmont LLC DBA Voyant Beauty Warehouse is committed to promoting a safe operating environment for the facility, its employees, and the surrounding community. The facility is complying with OSHA's Process Safety Management (PSM) standard, and EPA's Risk Management Program rule. The purpose of these regulations is to ensure that the covered process (aerosol packaging) is designed, operated, and maintained safely. Compliance with these regulations helps to prevent releases from this process. Additionally, these regulations require development of procedures to minimize releases if they do occur, and to outline appropriate emergency response steps to take in the event of a release. 

FACILITY DESCRIPTION AND REGULATED SUBSTANCES: 
Piedmont LLC DBA Voyant Beauty Warehouse is located at 1248 Palmour Drive, Gainesville, Georgia.  The Warehouse provides storage of incoming components and outgoing finished products for the Main facility.  The incoming components include metal cans, plastic valves and caps, and corrugated boxes.  DBA Voyant Beauty outgoing finished products include hair products, body sprays, shaving creams, household cleaners, etc.  Many of these products are aerosols and use a flammable gas like propane to pressurize the containers so that the desired product can be sprayed from the aerosol cans. For purposes of the Risk Management Plan, the Warehouse has been divided into 2 areas, System A  Aerosol Storage and System B  Aerosol Storage.  These 2 areas contain storage finished goods that contain Flammable Mixtures.   The following is how the Warehouse flammables were calculated:

System A  Aerosol Storage
Average size container  8 oz.			
Average Aerosol ration  50%			
0.03 percent aerosol ounces
0.06 gallons per container			
						
					Total Pounds:	0.28	System A

System B  Aerosol Storage
Average size container  8 oz.			
Average Aerosol ration  50%

0.

06 gallons per container			
						
					Total Pounds:	0.28	System B
					
4.52856  weight per gallon average
		Butane			31.3%		106-97-8
		Propane		47.8%		74-98-6
		Isobutane		20.9%		75-28-5

The contents of the Warehouse will vary as production requirements dictate. The Risk Management Plan has been prepared to include predictive filling, as the flammable propellant content of the packaged goods in storage may vary from 0 pounds to over 1,000,000 pounds.
For this Plan, System B was determined to be the worst case.

RELEASE PREVENTION PROGRAM: 
Piedmont LLC DBA Voyant Beauty believes the best way to prevent an accidental release is by being proactive in its approach to safety. The facility maintains information about the proper use of its equipment and the possible hazards. By following set operational procedures and scheduled maintenance practices, the equipment within the facility should continue to operate in a safe and effective manner. In addition, the Release Prevention Program is constantly being improved through employee training and regular compliance audits. 

FIVE-YEAR ACCIDENT HISTORY: 
Piedmont LLC DBA Voyant Beauty has not experienced any accidents within the last five years that either led to the release of hazardous chemicals or has had the potential to lead to such a release. 

EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM: 
A well planned emergency response program can make a tremendous difference in the potential impact of an accidental release. Quick actions can minimize the damage to both humans and the natural surroundings. Piedmont LLC DBA Voyant Beauty has coordinated emergency response efforts with appropriate local agencies and has instructed employees on the proper actions to take in the event of an accidental release.

PLANNED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY: 
The facility is continually working to improve safety in all areas. The facility encourages input from operation and maintenance personnel, as well as vendor and agency inspectors, and responds to address p
otential improvements. The facility places a high emphasis upon training of personnel in the areas of safety and environmental awareness, compliance, and response.
